00020 #include "rigidbar.h"
00021 #include "simulation.h"
00022 
00023 namespace mknix {
00024 
00025 RigidBar::RigidBar() : RigidBody()
00026 {
00027 }
00028 
00029 RigidBar::RigidBar( std::string title_in,
00030                     Node * nodeA_in,
00031                     Node * nodeB_in,
00032                     double mass_in
00033                   )
00034   : RigidBody( title_in ),
00035     mass(mass_in)
00036 {
00037   nodes.push_back( nodeA_in );
00038   nodes.push_back( nodeB_in );
00039   this->massMatrix.resize( 2*dim, 2*dim );
00040   this->externalForces.resize( 2*dim );
00041 }
00042 
00043 RigidBar::~RigidBar()
00044 {
00045 }
00046 
00047 void RigidBar::calcMassMatrix()
00048 {
00049   this->massMatrix(0,0) = 1./3.*mass ;
00050   this->massMatrix(1,1) = 1./3.*mass ;
00051   this->massMatrix(Simulation::getDim(),Simulation::getDim()) = 1./3.*mass ;
00052   this->massMatrix(Simulation::getDim()+1,Simulation::getDim()+1) = 1./3.*mass ;
00053 
00054   this->massMatrix(0,Simulation::getDim()) = 1./6.*mass ;
00055   this->massMatrix(Simulation::getDim(),0) = 1./6.*mass ;
00056   this->massMatrix(1,Simulation::getDim()+1) = 1./6.*mass ;
00057   this->massMatrix(Simulation::getDim()+1,1) = 1./6.*mass ;
00058 
00059   if (Simulation::getDim() == 3){
00060     this->massMatrix(2,2) = 1./3.*mass ;
00061     this->massMatrix(Simulation::getDim()+2,Simulation::getDim()+2) = 1./3.*mass ;
00062     this->massMatrix(2,Simulation::getDim()+2) = 1./6.*mass ;
00063     this->massMatrix(Simulation::getDim()+2,2) = 1./6.*mass ;
00064   }
00065 }
00066 
00067 void RigidBar::calcExternalForces()
00068 {
00069   this->externalForces(0) = -0.5 * mass * Simulation::getGravity(0);
00070   this->externalForces(1) = -0.5 * mass * Simulation::getGravity(1);
00071   if (Simulation::getDim() == 3)
00072     this->externalForces(2) = -0.5 * mass * Simulation::getGravity(2);
00073   this->externalForces(Simulation::getDim()) = -0.5 * mass * Simulation::getGravity(0);
00074   this->externalForces(Simulation::getDim()+1) = -0.5 * mass * Simulation::getGravity(1);
00075   if (Simulation::getDim() == 3)
00076     this->externalForces(Simulation::getDim()+2) = -0.5 * mass * Simulation::getGravity(2);
00077 }
00078 
00079 Node * RigidBar::getNode( std::string name_in )
00080 {
00081   if( name_in == "NODEA" ) return this->nodes[0];
00082   else if( name_in == "NODEB" ) return this->nodes[1];
00083   else cout << "ERROR: NO NODE WITH THAT NAME IN BAR" << endl;
00084 }
00085 
00086 }
